resources.string:
This is dedicated to all my 'yaar'. To friends who became really special and important part of my life since past few months. 
 
The random posts in #random channels by @nalayak surely brings smile on our faces in this fast-paced lives. 
 
The introduction challenge in the #introductions channel through which we know the vastness of Google Udacity Scholarship and the challenges which each one of us have crossed. 
 
The never ending challenges by all moderators in different channels that give us a head start and a big flight to meet deadlines in a fun and easy way. 
 
The list can go on and on. Here are some special ones whom I had a chance to be in contact with and who really inspires me to learn without limits. 
 
Thank you so much for being with me always :p
Akshit Jain is the Student Experience Lead at Udacity. He always comes up with great ideas and surprises for everyone. He is a really good friend and mentor alike who is always ready to help.
Geetanjali is the student moderator of #git_github channel on Slack. She always comes up with new challenges and tasks for everyone. She is a very good speaker and is confident in whatever she does.
Karthikeyan is the student moderator on Slack. He has amazing skills and is always ready to help no matter the time.

Lakshit is a very dedicated person towards his goal. He has amazing skills and is always doing something or the other. He is always available if I get stuck anywhere and provides instant and great solutions.
